subaccounts list and Subaccount Numbers
section.para: To access the master list of subaccount numbers, go to Accounting > Ledger Accounts > Subaccount Numbers. The following screen will appear:
The Subaccounts screen displays information on all existing subaccounts, including subaccount number and subaccount description.

note.para: The use of subaccounts can be enabled or disabled by default at the Setup > Accounting level.
